entry: Southern Cone Common Market (Mercosur) or Southern Common Market
description: note - also known as Mercado Comun del Sur (Mercosur - Spanish); Mercado Comum Sol (Mercosol - Portuguese) 26 March 1991 to increase regional economic cooperation members - (4) Argentina, Brazil, Paraguay, Uruguay; note - Venezuela was suspended associate members - (7) Bolivia, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Guyana, Peru, Surinameobservers - (2) New Zealand, Mexico
